title: ПроСТО кухня
overview: In the new culinary show "ProSTO Kitchen", the famous chef Alexander Belkovich will show how to feed a company of ten people, having only 100 rubles in his pocket. Russian Jamie Oliver will teach you how to cook restaurant-quality dishes in five minutes, save money on shopping in supermarkets and make culinary masterpieces from available ingredients. The host of the show "ProSTO Kitchen" will not only talk about unique recipes, but will also visit the hostesses to help with dinner and share the secrets of serving and storing food.
